channel.title: How do i go on a server with others and how do i keep my characters stuff?

hey ya i really dont know how to get this working right and i really really need help!! if anybody can help me please do!! this game is sweet just i cant get it right. so please somebody help
:confused: :(

item.title: How do i go on a server with others and how do i keep my characters stuff?
item.dc:creator: @FEARSCAPE FEARSCAPE
item.description:
@FEARSCAPE wrote:

Hi…If you want to go onto another server go to this website. www.aahost.nozonenet.com/serverstatus and go to the THIRD link. Then pick any server and on ur Moparscape Webclient go to ‘file’, ‘new server’…then type something like…71.75.83.182, and now go to file again and then go to ‘new port’ and type in 43594. Now if it says something like It might be down…just go to the website i gave u and find the one you think looks cool and just go have fun!

Please tell me if it dosen’t work

Read full topic
